title: Team Blocks
summaries: Team Blocks are decorative blocks purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 1 SC each. Team Blocks are available in six different colors, each representing one of the six team colors selectable in the player's inventory, including white for the neutral team.

Unlike <linked>Team Dye</linked> and <linked>Team Hair Dye</linked>, these blocks have no special function and are always the same color. The Traveling Merchant will only ever sell one color of Team Block at a time, along with the <linked>Team Platform</linked> of the same color, meaning that multiple visits will be required to collect all colors.

statistics.Sell: 20 CC
